sentence.Network_en: Abnormal brain - wave activity shows up on electroencephalograph readings.
sentence.Network_cn: 脑电图的读数上显示出异常的脑电波活动.

sentence.Network_en: For instance, electrocardiograph can detect heart's condition. Electroencephalograph can detect brain's condition.
sentence.Network_cn: 例如, 心电图仪可查抄人的心脏状态, 脑电图仪可查抄人的前脑状态.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To describe characteristic of sleep electroencephalograph ( EEG ) in depressions with psychogenic anxiety.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的探索精神焦虑性抑郁症的睡眠脑电图特征.
